title: 1.Myki what
en: What is myki: Victoria’s contactless smart card for trains, trams and buses.

title: 2.Myki get
en: Where to get a card: online, station machines, PTV Hubs, or retailers like 7‑Eleven.

title: 3.Myki top up
en: Top up: online, in PTV app (instant), myki machines, or retailers (ask staff).

title: 4.Myki touch on
en: Start trip: hold your card to the myki reader until it beeps/green (Touch on).

title: 5.Myki touch off
en: Finish trip: on trains and buses, touch off at the reader to get the best fare.

title: 6.Myki tram rule
en: On trams: no touch off. Inside the Free Tram Zone, you don’t need to touch on.

title: 7.Myki gates
en: At stations: use your myki at the gates to enter/exit.

title: 8.Myki balance
en: Check balance: glance at the reader/machine screen after touch; top up if low.

title: 9.Myki print
en: Official PDFs (multi‑language) for printing: myki and how to travel.
